Package controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardGameConstructor  
    BuildingRuleChecker
    A class that collects rules affecting the construction rules
    MovementRuleChecker
    A class that checks if the movement requested is legal
    Turn
    A class to manage move and build phases
    TurnConstruction  
    TurnManager  
    VictoryConditionChecker
    A class that checks the situation of every worker to find the winner
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PhaseResult
    An enumeration that represents the result of a phase: NEXT phase, the player's VICTORY or the player's DEFEAT, DISCONNECTED when occurs the connection is closed.
